head.supplied: Melbourne botanic Gardens ¶ 22/3/64 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you, that at a Meeting of the Trustees of the Royal Park, held this day I was instructed to request the favor of your and Mr A...

div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter and minute book, p. 9, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

I have the honor to inform you, that at a Meeting of the Trustees of the Royal Park, held this day I was instructed to request the favor of your and Mr A Purchase's
See M to A. Purchas, 22 March 1864. attendance at the Park, with a view to inspecting the S.W. Angle and the entrance to the Park on this point, and of submitting to the Trustees your opinion in reference to the desired improvements in that direction and an estimate of the expenditure thereby likely incurred.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
